overview:
Mark has worked in the Internet industry since the early 90’s, starting one of Cambridge’s early web design agencies, and progressing to Internet only businesses in the fields of information management, online gaming and b2c focussed services.

After the crash Mark spent some time with the IMG group, leading the development of Sports.com’s 2002 world cup website, before moving into online gaming and video with Gamer.tv. More recently Mark spent some time in local government implementing a 2m IT spent to deliver electronic government, before joining Opportunity Links as MD to focus on supporting government in using new technologies to deliver information to citizens.

In 2009 Mark founded BeGrand.net; a national online service for grandparents, securing initial funding from the Department of Children Schools and Families to launch the service in early 2010.
